title: Matthew Perry
summary: Matthew Langford Perry (born August 19, 1969) is a Canadian-American actor, executive producer, and comedian. He is best known for his role as Chandler Bing on the NBC television sitcom Friends,[1][2] which ran from 1994 to 2004. Due to the immense popularity of the sitcom, Perry and the rest of the six-member main cast ensemble were each making $1 million per episode by 2002.[3]
